attributes.action: David Cameron to be involved in EU referendum televised debates.
attributes.background: David Cameron has said behind closed doors that he will not take part in televised debates. He has said he will only take part in a Question Time style event where he can give a speech and take some questions from the audience. The British people need to hear all sides of the argument together.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the Prime Minister and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
